all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
Behold, I say unto you, go forth as I have commanded you; repent of all your sins; ask and ye shall receive; knock and it shall be opened unto you.
Doctrine and Covenants 49:26
Quote of the Day
"Our Heavenly Father and Savior see you. They know your heart. They care about what you care about, including those you love."
Kristin M. Yee | 1 Oct 2024General Conference
